summary: When dwindling membership and increasing overheads makes a local bowling club and prime candidate for a takeover, it's all hands on deck to save the club, in what turns into an epic battle ... See full summary »
cast: Mick Molloy|Bill Hunter|Frank Wilson|Monica Maughan|John Clarke|Lois Ramsey|Samuel Johnson|Judith Lucy|Cliff Ellen|Bob Hornery|Peter Aanensen|Esme Melville|John Flaus|Lois Collinder|Paul McCarthy|Teague Rook|Dino Marnika|Robyn Butler|Brett Swain|Lew Luton|Denis Moore|Tim Sullivan|Joan Murray|Tony Martin|Christopher Kirby|Steve Hutchison|Greg Francis|Andrew Gilmour|Stuart Baker|Earl Francis|Robert Ratti|Pete Smith|Matthew Loe|Lou Virgato|Tom Travers|Jim Koutsoukos|Alfons Beutelschiess|Chris John Ambrose|Michael Ienna|Michael Twyman
title: Crackerjack
